mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article ( title, content, date, path ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), #{path} )
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, date = NOW(), path = {path} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, `date`, content, path FROM article WHERE id = #{value}
SELECT id, title, `date`, content, path FROM article ORDER BY `date` desc LIMIT #{startNum}, #{pageSize}
